author: Ashok Dixit
title: Featured | TopNews
text: Mitsubishi Fuso Bus & Truck Corporation, a Japanese manufacturer of commercial vehicles headquartered in Kawasaki, has made a significant stride in the realm of electric mobility with the launc The Rivian R2, an all-new electric midsize SUV, has caused seismic ripples in the automotive world by securing impressive 68,000 reservations in less than 24 hours, generating approximately $7 mill Triumphantly emerging from the shadows of the Chevrolet Blazer EV hiatus, General Motors (GM) has announced that the battery electric mid-size crossover SUV has returned to the market with a game-c Tesla Motors, the trailblazer in the global electric car industry, is taking a proactive step to address the evolving challenges at its Supercharging stations through the development of a NACS exte In a strategic move to promote EV adoption, South Korean automobile giant Hyundai Motor Company has announced the launch of a groundbreaking trade-in program to incentivize buyers to switch to EVs Hyundai’s beloved Ioniq 5 compact crossover electric SUV is set to captivate enthusiasts once again, thanks to a series of upgrades announced by the brand for the anticipated 2025 model year. © 2005-2023 TOPNEWS.IN ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
